184a4('bum): skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bunang stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ mi dmigs
184a5('bum): pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to// phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul
184a6('bum): kyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to// chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul
184a7('bum): gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ mi dmigs pa
184b1('bum): tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to// bza' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi
184b2('bum): phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to// dor ba med
184b3('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to// chos
184b4('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan
184b5('bum): mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyi theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan
184b6('bum): tongo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum
184b7('bum): rgya cher bstan to// nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to// sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ sems bcu pa
185a1('bum): bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
185a2('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang //
185a3('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
185a4('bum): nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /
185a5('bum): mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang ga yang
185a6('bum): dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phag/
185a7('bum): pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms/
185b1('bum): par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar par ma spong pa nyid dang / mtshan sa med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin pams cad dang / gdungs kyi sobs
185b2('bum): cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
185b3('bum): ba bco brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sem
185b4('bum): dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyod cing rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro//
185b5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang bkur stir bya ba dang ka phu dud du bya ba dang sha mchod
185b6('bum): bar bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
185b7('bum): thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par mi 'gyur ro// 'khrug pa med pa dang mnyam par gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems
186a1('bum): kya / dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang rgyun 'chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs/
186a2('bum): pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang
186a3('bum): yang ldan par 'gyur ro// phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to// sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ sems bcu pa
186a4('bum): bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi
186a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa
186a6('bum): nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang thog ma dang
186a7('bum): tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa
186b1('bum): nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo tshad stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i rnga ba nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /
186b2('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /
186b3('bum): bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang
186b4('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin
186b5('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
186b6('bum): ngag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems
186b7('bum): dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur
187a1('bum): ro sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba
187a2('bum): dang phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa
187a3('bum): de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur kyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par mi 'gyur ro// 'khrug pa med pa dang mnyam par gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par
187a4('bum): gzhag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang rgyun 'chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang
187a5('bum): mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing
187a6('bum): khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bstan to// sems dang
187a7('bum): bskyed pa nas/ sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems pa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol
187b1('bum): tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtar kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / byi stong pa nyid dang
187b2('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /
187b3('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi
187b4('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar
187b5('bum): gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan
187b6('bum): lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /
187b7('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i ni stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzi
188a1('bum): thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
188a2('bum): byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang /
188a3('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o//
188a4('bum): des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing / dge brtsa ba gang gis sangs
188a5('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur/
188a6('bum): ro sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par mi 'gyur ro// 'khrug pa med
188a7('bum): pa dang mnyam par gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med
188b1('bum): pa'i bas pa dang / rnan 'chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag par spobs pa dang / rigs par spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pas
188b2('bum): spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing kyang zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyir / kyang rnas
188b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to// sems dang po brjed pa nas/ sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar ci byang chub sems dpa' lam 'di lta ste/
188b4('bum): ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyipha rol tu na
188b5('bum): ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang byi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen mo stong pa nyid dang
188b6('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang thog ma dang tha med pa stong pa nyid dang /
188b7('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dang
189a1('bum): po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba/
189a2('bum): bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i
189a3('bum): bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i
189a4('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /
189a5('bum): gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje
189a6('bum): chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par
189a7('bum): rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor cing rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// des na mngon par
189b1('bum): shes pa rnams la yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa bgang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
189b2('bum): de dag la rib gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / bu rung du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas
189b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par mi 'gyur ro// 'khrug pa med pa dang mnyam par
189b4('bum): gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang /
189b5('bum): rgyun 'chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'ji/
189b6('bum): rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
189b7('bum): po yongs su bzung ba bstan to// sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrim
190a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha
190a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /
190a3('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang
190a4('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong
190a5('bum): pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang
190a6('bum): stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang /
190a7('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshanas/
190b1('bum): med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ga mi 'jigs
190b2('bum): pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan byang chub sems dpa'
190b3('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol
190b4('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod cing rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs
190b5('bum): rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta
190b6('bum): bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur kyi bar du
190b7('bum): nam yang rgyun 'chad par mi 'gyur ro// 'khrug pa med pa dang mnyam par gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
191a1('bum): chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun 'chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang
191a2('bum): rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang
191a3('bum): ldan par 'gyur ro// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po brgya lnga pa// / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sem
191a4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to// sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol
191a5('bum): tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab
191a6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /
191a7('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang
191b1('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang // ngo bo nyid stong
191b2('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang /
191b3('bum): stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang /
191b4('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang ga mtshan
191b5('bum): ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi
191b6('bum): 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems
191b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi sa
192a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos cad du yang 'gyur ro// sangs
192a2('bum): rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod
192a3('bum): bar bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
192a4('bum): thob par ma gyur gyi bar du napa yang rgyun 'chad par mi 'gyur ro// 'khrug pa med pa dang mnyam par gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems
192a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun 'chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs
192a6('bum): ba'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par
192a7('bum): 'gyur ro// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to// sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ sems bcu
192b1('bum): pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus
192b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa
192b3('bum): nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /
192b4('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang ka dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs
192b5('bum): stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa che bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par
192b6('bum): spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang
192b7('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar
193a1('bum): kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par
193a2('bum): shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag
193a3('bum): par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
193a4('bum): rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing rdzus te/
193a5('bum): skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing / dge
193a6('bum): ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / bu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i sa de dag kyang phun sum
193a7('bum): tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur kyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par mi 'gyur ro//
193b1('bum): 'jug pa med pa dang mnyam par gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs/
193b2('bum): pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun 'chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan
193b3('bum): pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyar zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir/
193b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to// sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di ste/ sbyin pa
193b5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes
193b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus
193b7('bum): byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa
194a1('bum): nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa
194a2('bum): nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga
194a3('bum): dpang byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i
194a4('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon
194a5('bum): pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so ya/
194a6('bum): dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi
194a7('bum): mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul cis rnam par rtse ba dag cang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spong cing rdzus te skye bar yun
194b1('bum): zhes bya'o// des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyabs pa med pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis
194b2('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / mu dung du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur
194b3('bum): ro sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang zos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang d+han 'chad par mi 'gyur ro// 'jug pa med pa dang /
194b4('bum): mnyam par gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag po dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs
194b5('bum): ba dang / rgyun 'chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang
194b6('bum): 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
194b7('bum): sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to// sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
195a1('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang shes rab
195a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus
195a3('bum): byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid
195a4('bum): dang nga chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po
195a5('bum): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi
195a6('bum): yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
195a7('bum): 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang /
195b1('bum): mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa
195b2('bum): bzhi dang byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brkyang dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa/
195b3('bum): dang rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o//
195b4('bum): des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas
195b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro//
195b6('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par mi 'gyur ro// 'khrug pa med pa dang
195b7('bum): mnyam par gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i
196a1('bum): spobs pa dang / rgyun 'chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang /
196a2('bum): don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// thog ma dang tha ma med pa spong /
196a3('bum): pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to// sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam
196a4('bum): 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi
196a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang spyong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang /
196a6('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med
196a7('bum): bstong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po rid pa stong pa nyid dang /
196b1('bum): ngab cang spong ba nyid dang / dngos pa med par nga ba zhing stong pa nyid dang / drad pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi gang pa bzhi dang ga dbang balnga
196b2('bum): dang stobs la dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brkyang pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan ba'izhi dang / chad med pa bzhing /
196b3('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
196b4('bum): ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang mi 'jig
196b5('bum): pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa'
196b6('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol
196b7('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod cing rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs
197a1('bum): rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang bu rung du bya ba dang mchod
197a2('bum): par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
197a3('bum): thob par ma gyur kyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par mi 'gyur ro// 'khrug pa med pa dang mnyam par gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro// byang chub
197a4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun 'chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang /
197a5('bum): rigs pa'i spobs pa dang 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang
197a6('bum): ldan par 'gyur ro// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to// sems dang po bskyed pa nas/
197a7('bum): sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
197b1('bum): dang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / gyi stong pa nyid dang / byin
197b2('bum): stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus pa byas stong pa nyid dang /
197b3('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan
197b4('bum): nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag
197b5('bum): ba bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
197b6('bum): ba dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis
197b7('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /
198a1('bum): gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje
198a2('bum): chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag
198a3('bum): kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// des na mngon par shes pa rnams la
198a4('bum): yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim
198a5('bum): gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
198a6('bum): de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur kyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par mi 'gyur ro// 'khrug pa med pa dang mnyam par gzhag pa med pa'i
198a7('bum): tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun 'chang
198b1('bum): ba med pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rig pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad
198b2('bum): las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyirabyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs
198b3('bum): su bzung ba bstan to// sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta skye/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi
198b4('bum): rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang gnang stong
198b5('bum): pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma
198b6('bum): byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams
198b7('bum): cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
199a1('bum): stong pa nyid dang / drad pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang // byang chub
199a2('bum): kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yang lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
199a3('bum): 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtsharan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang
199a4('bum): mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa
199a5('bum): bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa
199a6('bum): rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing
199a7('bum): rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'do zhi
199b1('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / pu rung du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun
199b2('bum): su pa tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur kyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par mi 'gyur
199b3('bum): ro 'khrug pa med pa dang mnyab par gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul
199b4('bum): gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun 'chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang / don
199b5('bum): dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyar zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// chos thams cad stong pa nyid
199b6('bum): kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to// sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di
199b7('bum): lta ste sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol
200a1('bum): tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen/
200a2('bum): po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong
200a3('bum): pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang
200a4('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul
200a5('bum): gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam
200a6('bum): gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rang
200a7('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de
200b1('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
200b2('bum): pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems
200b3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par spyod cing rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du
200b4('bum): yang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang /
200b5('bum): phu rung du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam
200b6('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur kyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par mi 'gyur ro// 'khrug pa med pa dang mnyam par gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par gzhag
200b7('bum): par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun 'chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par
201a1('bum): gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten tham cad las mngon par 'ab/
201a2('bum): shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to//
201a3('bum): sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang
201a4('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa
201a5('bum): nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang
201a6('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog pa dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan
201a7('bum): nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhas
201b1('bum): pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang 'phags pa'i yan lag
201b2('bum): brkyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /
201b3('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin
201b4('bum): thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po
201b5('bum): dang snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul
201b6('bum): gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// des na/
201b7('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas
202a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das de dag la ring zor bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / bu rungad du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang dran
202a2('bum): sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rlan 'chad par mi gyur
202a3('bum): ro 'khrug pa med pa dang mnyab par gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul
202a4('bum): kyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun 'chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang
202a5('bum): don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing lung zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// mi dmigs pa stong pa dang
202a6('bum): kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to// sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta/
202a7('bum): ste sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
202b1('bum): rang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / byi stong pa nyid dang / byinang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid thong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pad
202b2('bum): dang 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang
202b3('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
202b4('bum): dang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / drar pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang /
202b5('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms
202b6('bum): par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa
202b7('bum): dang mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par
203a1('bum): rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
203a2('bum): chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing
203a3('bum): rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhig
203a4('bum): dge ba'i rtse ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / bu rung du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang /
203a5('bum): phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du na pa yang rgyun 'chad par mi 'gyur ro//
203a6('bum): 'khrug pa med pa dang mnyam par gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
203a7('bum): thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyud 'chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan
203b1('bum): pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyang zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// dngos po med pastong pa nyid ci
203b2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to// sems dang po bsrud pa nas/ sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i las 'di lnga ste/ sbyin pa'am/
203b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shos rab tu
203b4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus
203b5('bum): byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa
203b6('bum): nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos
203b7('bum): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi lan
204a1('bum): lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsapa gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa
204a2('bum): spobs par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa
204a3('bum): med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang
204a4('bum): dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon
204a5('bum): par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing rdzus te skye bar 'gyur
204a6('bum): zhes bya'o// des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis/
204a7('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / su rung du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phur sum tshogs par 'gyur ro//
204b1('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang dab pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par mi 'gyur ro// 'khrug pa med pa dang mnyam par
204b2('bum): gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang gargyun
204b3('bum): 'chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad
204b4('bum): las mngon par 'phags shing khyang zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// de ba nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung
204b5('bum): bstan to// sems dang po bskyed pa ras/ sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
204b6('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang /
204b7('bum): byi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das
205a1('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi
205a2('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
205a3('bum): bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /
205a4('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i sgom
205a5('bum): par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo bas
205a6('bum): cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
205a7('bum): 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems
205b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyis rol tu phyin pa ma spyod cing rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// des na mngon par shes pa rnams la 'ongs sums pa med pa'ims can du
205b2('bum): ro sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / bu drang du bya ba dang /
205b3('bum): mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
205b4('bum): thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par mi 'gyur ro// 'khrug pa med pa dang mnyam par gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems
205b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun 'chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spod pa dang / rigs pa'i srob
205b6('bum): ba dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro//
205b7('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to// sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang
206a1('bum): chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'gru
206a2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid
206a3('bum): stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog pa/
206a4('bum): dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba meng pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa
206a5('bum): stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang yang dag par spong ba bzhi
206a6('bum): rang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi
206a7('bum): dang bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu
206b1('bum): rang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang ston pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang // de bzhin
206b2('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag
206b3('bum): kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
206b4('bum): chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro//
206b5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mcho
206b6('bum): par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba rtsa ba de dag thams cad kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
206b7('bum): pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar ru nam yang rgyun 'chad par mi 'gyur ro// 'khrug pa med pa dang mnyam par gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro//
207a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun 'chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam
207a2('bum): par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad
207a3('bum): zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las le'u bcu drug go// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
207a4('bum): pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po brgya drug pa// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis de ltar chos kyi char pa 'di phab ste
207a5('bum): bstan/ de la bdag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mchod par bya ba'i phyir me tog mngon par sprul pa byas te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' sem
207a6('bum): dpa' chen po rnams dang dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams dang / gnas gtan rab 'byor la gtor bar bya'o// mngon par gtor bar bya'o// rab tu gtor bar bya'o snyam mo// stong gsum
207a7('bum): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha dang mtshe ba'i lha dang / dga' ldan gyi lha dang / 'phrul dga'i lha dang / gzhan 'phrul
207b1('bum): dbang byed kyi lha dang / tshangs ris kyi lha dang / tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha dang / tshangs chen gyi lha dang / snang ba'i lha dang / chung snang gi lha dang / tshad mer snang bam
207b2('bum): lha dang / kun sdang dang ba'i lha dang / dge ba'i lha dang / chung dge'i lha dang / tshad med dge ba'i lha dang / dge rgyas kyi lha dang / che ba'i lha dang / chung che'i lha dang / tshad med che ba'i lha dang / 'bras
207b3('bum): bu che ba'i lha dang / sa che ba'i lha dang / mi gdung ba'i lha dang ka shin tu mthong ba'i lha dang / gya nos snang ba'i lha dang / 'og min gyi lha ji skad cig yod pa de dag kyang 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/
207b4('bum): de ltar gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis chos kyi char pa 'di phab ste bstan na/ de la bdag cag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mchod par bya ba'i phyir me tog mngon par sprul pa byas te/
207b5('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams dang / gnas brtan rab 'byor la gtor bar bya'o// mngon par gtor
207b6('bum): bar bya'o// rab tu gtor bar bya'o snyam mo// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha
207b7('bum): dbang mtshe ma'i lha dang / dga' ldan gyi lha dang / 'phrul dga'i lha dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha dang / tshangs ris kyi lha dang ga tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha dang /
208a1('bum): tshangs chen gyi lha dang / snang ba'i lha dang chung sdang gi lha dang tshad med sdang ba'i lha dang kun snang dang ba'i lha dang ga dge ba'i lha dang tha chung dge'i lha dang / tshad med dge ba'i
208a2('bum): lha dang / dge rgyas kyi lha dang / che ba'i lha dang / chung che'i lha dang / tshad med che ba'i lha dang 'bras bu che ba'i lha dang / mi che ba'i lha dang / mi gdung ba'i lha dang shin tu mthong ba'i lha dang
208a3('bum): nos sdang ba'i lha dang / 'og min gyi lha de dag thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mchod par bya ba'i phyir/ lha rdzas kyi me tog man dar ba mang po mngon par sprul te/ sangs rgyas bcom
208a4('bum): ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams dang ga gnas brtan rab 'byor la 'thor bar gyur to// mngon par 'thor bar gyur to//
208a5('bum): rab tu 'thor bar gyur to// me tog de dag gis gtor ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i sa gzhi me tog gis khebs par gyur nas steng gi bar snang la yang /
208a6('bum): me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams tsam mdangs dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba kun nas gnas par gyur to// de nas gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di snyam
208a7('bum): du sems par gyur te/ 'di ltar lha rnams kyis mngon par gtor ba'i me tog 'di dag ni ga bdag gis sngan chad lha'i gnas thams cad na yang yod par ma mthong ste/ me tog 'di dag ni sprul
208b1('bum): ba ro 'di ltar lha'i bu dag gis mngon par gtor ba'i me tog 'di dag ni / ldum bu las byung ba ma yin/ mu las skyes pa ma yin pazang las skyes pa ma yin no// 'di ltar lnga'i bu
208b2('bum): ngag gis mngon par gtor ba'i me tog 'di dag ni yid las byung ba ste ka me tog 'di dag ni ldum bu las byung ba ma yin no snyab pa dang / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis
208b3('bum): gnas brtan rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa rab 'byor me tog 'di dag ni ma byang ba ste/ me tog 'di dag ni yid las byung ba yin no// ldum bu las byung ba ma yin no//
208b4('bum): rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ko'u shi ka de skad du me tog 'di dag ma skyes pa ste/ me tog 'di dag yid las byung ba ma yin/ ldum bu las byung ba ma yin no zhes zer ba ni/ ko'u shi ka de ltar ma
208b5('bum): skyes pa ni me tog kyang ma yin no// brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor me tog 'di dag nyi tshe ma byung bar zad dam/ 'on tam gzugs kyang ma byung / tshor ba yang ma byung / 'du shes
208b6('bum): kyang ma byung / 'du byed kyang ma byung / rnam par shes pa yang ma byung ba yinapa/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ko'u shi ka me tog 'di dag nyi tshe ma byung bar ma zad kyi/ ko'u shi ka gzugs kyang ma byung
208b7('bum): ba ste gang ma byung ba de ni gzugs pa yin no// ko'u shi ka tshor ba yang ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni tshor ba ma yin no// ko'u shi ka 'du shes kyang ma byung ba ste gang ma byung ba de ni 'du
209a1('bum): shes ma yin no// ko'u shi ka 'du byed kyang ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni 'du byed ma yin no// ko'u shi ka rnam par shes pa yang ma byung ba ste/ gang ma
209a2('bum): byung ba de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no// ko'u shi ka mig ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni mig ma yin no// ko'u shi ka rna ba ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni rna ba ma yin no// ko
209a3('bum): shi ka sna ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni sna ma yin no// ko'u shi ka lce ri ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni lce ma yin no// ko'u shi ka lus ni ma byung ba ste/ gar ma byung ba de ni lus
209a4('bum): ma yin no// ko'u shi ka yid ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni yod ma yin no// ko'u shi ka gzugs ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni gzugs ma yin no// ko'u shin sla ni ma byung
209a5('bum): ste gang me byung ba de ni sgra ma yin no// ko'u shi ka dri ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni dri ma yin no// ko'u shi ka ro ni me byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni ro ma yin no// ke'u shi ka reg ni
209a6('bum): sa byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni reg ma yin no// ko'u shi ka tshes ni ma byu sa ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni chos ma yin no// ko'u shi ka mig gi rnam par shes pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba den
209a7('bum): mig gi rnam par shes pa ma yin no// ko'u shi kan ba'i rnam par shes pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni rna ba'i rnam par shes ngam yin no// ko'u shi ka sna'i rnam par shes pa ni byung
209b1('bum): steng gang ma byung ba de ni snga'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no// ko'u shi ka lce'i rnam par shes pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni lce'i rnam par shes pa pa yin no// ko ru shi ka lus kyi nga
209b2('bum): par shes pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin no// ko'u shi ka yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni ma rung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin
209b3('bum): no nga ko'u shi ka mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// ko'u shi ka rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni rna ba'i 'dus
209b4('bum): te reg pa ma yin no// kol shi ka sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni snga'i 'dus te reg pa yin no// ko'u shi ka lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba
209b5('bum): ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// ko'u shi ka lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// ko'u shi ka yid kyi 'dus te reg pa na
209b6('bum): ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// ko'u shi ka mig gi 'dus te rig pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa
209b7('bum): las byung ba'i tshor ba ma yin no// ko'u shi ka rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma yin no//
210a1('bum): ko'u shi ka sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma yin no// ko'u shi ka lce'i 'dus
210a2('bum): te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma yin no// ko'u shi ka lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni ma byung ba ste/
210a3('bum): gang ma byung ba de ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma yin no// ko'u shi ka yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa
210a4('bum): las byung ba'i tshor ba ma yin no// ko'u shi ka sa'i khams ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni sa'i khams ma yin no// ko'u shi ka chu'i khams ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni chu'i kham
210a5('bum): ma yin no// ko'u shi ka me'i khams ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni me'i khams ma yin no// ko'u shi ka rlung gi khams ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ba byung ba de ni rlung gi khams ma yin no//
210a6('bum): shi ka nam mkha'i khams ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni nam mkha'i khams ma yin no// ko'u shi ka rnam par shes pa'i khams ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni rnam par shes pa'i khams ma
210a7('bum): yin no// ko'u shi ka ma rig pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni ma rig pa ma yin no// ko'u shi ka 'du byed ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni 'du byed ma yin no// ko'u shi ka rnam par shes pa
210b1('bum): nim byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no// ko'u shig ming dang gzugs ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni ming dang gzugs ma yin no// ko'u shig skye mched drug ni ma byung
210b2('bum): bste gang ma byung ba de ni skye mched drug ma yin no// ko'u shi ka reg pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni rig pa ma yin no// ko'u shi ka tshor ba ni ma byung ba ste/ gangs byung ba don tshor ba ma yin
210b3('bum): no ko'u shi ka srid pa nis byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni sred pa ma yin no// ko'u shi ka len pa ri ba byung ba ste/ gang sa bung ba de ni len pa ma yin no// ko'u shi ka sring po ni ma byung ba steg gang pa
210b4('bum): byung ba de ni srid pa ma yin no// ko'u shi ka skye ba no byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni skye ba ma yin no// kauru shi kan shi ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni rga shi ma yin no// ko'u shig sbyin pa'i
210b5('bum): rol tu phyin pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// ko'u shi ka tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
210b6('bum): ma yin no// ko'u shi ka bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// ko'u shi ka brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma byung ba ste gang
210b7('bum): ma byung ba de ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// ko'u shi ka bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// ko'u
211a1('bum): shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// ko'u shi ka nang stong pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de
211a2('bum): ni nang stong pa nyid ma yin no// ko'u shi ka phyi stong pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni byi stong pa nyid ma yin no// ko'u shi ka phyi nang stong pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni phyi nang so//
211a3('bum): pa nyid ma yin no// ko'u shi ka stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no// ko'u shi ka chen po stong pa nyid ni mi byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni chen po
211a4('bum): stong pa nyid ma yin no// ko'u shi ka don dam pa stong pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni don dam pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// ko'u shi ka 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba
211a5('bum): de ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma yin no// ko'u shi ka 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma yin no// ko'u shi ka mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
211a6('bum): nyid ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// ko ru shi ka thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa
211a7('bum): nyid ma yin no// ko'u shi ka dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// ko'u shi ka rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni rang
211b1('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid pa yin no// ko'u shi ka chos thams cad spyod pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma yin no// ko'u shi ka rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid nis byung ba
211b2('bum): ste gang ma byung ba de ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no// ko'u shi ka mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// ko'u shi ka dngos
211b3('bum): po med pa stong pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni dngos po med pa spong pa nying ma yin no// ko'u shig de za tshad stong pa nyid nam byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sa yin no//
211b4('bum): ko'u shi ka dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no// ko'u shi ka dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma
211b5('bum): byung ba de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma yin no// ko'u shi ka yang dag par spong ba rnams ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni yang dag par spong ba rnams ma yin no// ko'u shi ka rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
211b6('bum): rim byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma yin no// ko'u shi ka dbang po rnams ni ma byung ba steg gang ma byung ba de ni dbang po rnams ma yin no// ko'u shi ka stobs rnams ni ma byung ba ste/
211b7('bum): gang 'byung ba de ni stobs rnams ma yin no// ko'u shi ka byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma yin no// ko'u shi ka 'phags pa'i lam
212a1('bum): yan lag brgyad pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin no// ko'u shi ka 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni ma byung ba steg kang ma
212a2('bum): byung ba de ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma yin no// ko'u shi ka bsam gtan rnams ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni bsam gtan rnams ma yin no// ko'u shi ka tshad med pa rnams ni ma byung ba
212a3('bum): steng gang ma byung ba de ni tshad med pa rnams ma yin no// ko'u shi ka gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni ma byung ba ste ga gang sa byung ba de ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ma yin no//
212a4('bum): ko'u shi ka rnam par thar pa brgyad ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni rnam par thar pa rnams ma yin no// ko'u shi ka mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de
212a5('bum): ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin no// ko'u shi ka rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni rnam par/
212a6('bum): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ma yin no// ko'u shi ka mngon par shes pa rnams ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni mngon par shes pa rnams ma yin no//
212a7('bum): ko'u shi ka ting nge 'dzin rnams ni ma byung ba ste ka gang pa byung ba de ni ting nge 'dzin rnams ma yin no// ko'u shi ka gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma yin no//
212b1('bum): ko 'u shi ka de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni ma byung ba ste/ gang pa byung ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma yin no// ko'u shi ka mi 'jigs pa bzhi ma byung ba ste/ gang pa byung ba de ni mi
212b2('bum): 'jigs pa rnams ma yin no// ko'u shi ka so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni ma byung ba ste ga gang ma byung ba de ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma yin no// ko'u shi ka byams pa chen po mi mabyung
